title: When is the Season 5 Reset?
body:
When is the reset?  What happens if I'm already Gold 5? What happens to my smurf where i haven't finished playing my 10 ranked games?
Please Help....

replies.body:
Haven't you gone through a reset before?

Well, here's what happens. Everyone in the entire world becomes unranked with zero wins. Simple.

To be a bit more technically, your past rank has some input on exactly who you verse when you redo your placement matches i.e. if you were Gold 5 then you'll probably verse high Silvers and low Golds in your placements (or at least, people who were that division last season.)

For your account which was in placements, then it'll just go back to zero wins. You'll just start it from the start.

Hope that clears it up.
